question: What instrument does Johnny Galecki play, which was also incorporated into his character on The Big Bang Theory?

content: Question: What instrument does Johnny Galecki play, which was also incorporated into his character on The Big Bang Theory?

<python>
results = search_pages("Johnny Galecki instrument The Big Bang Theory")
if results:
    page_id = results[0]['page_id']
    sections = view_sections(page_id)
    for section in sections:
        section_id = section['section_id']
        content = read_section(section_id)
        if "instrument" in content.lower() or "plays" in content.lower():
            print(content)
            break
</python>

results = search_pages("Johnny Galecki The Big Bang Theory instrument")
if results:
    page_id = results[0]['page_id']
    content = read_section(page_id + ":full")
    print(content)

# Johnny Galecki

**John Mark Galecki** (born April 30, 1975) is an American actor. He played [Hofstadter](Leonard)(Leonard Hofstadter) in the [CBS](CBS) sitcom *[Big Bang Theory](The)(The Big Bang Theory)* (2007–2019) for which he received a [Emmy Award](Primetime)(Primetime Emmy Award) nomination, and [Healy](David)(List of Roseanne and The Conners characters#David Healy) in the [ABC](American Broadcasting Company) sitcoms *[Roseanne](Roseanne)* (1992–1997; 2018) and *[Conners](The)(The Conners)* (2018–2019). Galecki also appeared in the films *[Prancer](Prancer (film))* (1989), ''[Lampoon's Christmas Vacation](National)(National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation)* (1989), *[Kings](Suicide)(Suicide Kings)* (1997), *[Know What You Did Last Summer](I)(I Know What You Did Last Summer)* (1997), *[Bookies](Bookies (film))* (2003), *[Time](In)(In Time)* (2011), and *[Rings](Rings (2017 film))* (2017).

Galecki was one of the highest paid television actors in the world, with his role in *The Big Bang Theory'' earning him approximately US$900,000 per episode between 2017 and 2019. In 2018, he was estimated to be the world's second highest-paid male TV actor by *[Forbes](Forbes)* (behind only his *The Big Bang Theory* co-star [Parsons](Jim)(Jim Parsons)), earning $25 million.

## Early life

Galecki was born in [Bree](Bree, Belgium), [Limburg](Limburg (Belgium)), Belgium to American parents of [Polish](Polish people), [Irish](Irish people), and [Italian](Italians) descent. His mother, Mary Louise (Mary Lou) Noon, was a mortgage consultant, and his father, Richard Galecki, was a member of the [Air Force](U.S.)(U.S. Air Force) stationed in [Belgium](Belgium) and worked as a rehabilitation teacher. Galecki is the eldest of three children with a sister, Allison, and a brother, Nick, whom he describes as a "mechanical genius" in the [industry](automotive)(automotive industry).["Conan Show Schedule January 2–6, 2012"](https://archive.today/20120717163817/http://teamcoco.com/schedule/2012-01). Team Coco. Retrieved January 1, 2012. Galecki grew up in [Park, Illinois](Oak)(Oak Park, Illinois). He droppe

... [6685 chars truncated] ...

as gay. They remain close friends.

While working on *The Big Bang Theory*, Galecki dated co-star [Cuoco](Kaley)(Kaley Cuoco) for about two years until December 2009 while the two also played a couple on the show. Cuoco told *[Watch](CBS)(CBS Watch)* that they have remained on good terms since ending their relationship.

Galecki owns 360 acres of land in [Margarita, California](Santa)(Santa Margarita, California). His property included vineyards and a log cabin.  In late June 2017, Galecki's ranch was destroyed in a major [wildfire](2017 California wildfires) known as the [Fire](Hill)(2017 California wildfires#Wildfires). Galecki, in a media statement, said wildfire was "the threat ... we live with constantly, which may seem crazy to some but we do so because living in our beautiful, rural area makes it worthwhile".

In August 2018, Galecki started dating Alaina Meyer. [Non-loginwalled link at bibliogram.pussthecat.org](https://bibliogram.pussthecat.org/p/Bl_63oNAvw9) Their son, Avery, was born in November 2019. In November 2020, it was reported that Galecki and Meyer had separated.
